title: Re: *chooses "Yes"*
content:
You are 23 and you still have to master the common comma? I did not know australian educational standrds were as low as ours.

Oh well, happy birthday and many happy returns!
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: *chooses "Yes"*
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]You are 23 and you still have to master the common comma?[hr][/quote]
Untrue! He's not 23 yet. He has plenty of time before then to learn that commas are for separating independent clauses only with the addition of a coordinating conjunction (and for delimiting lists and setting off parenthetical phrases). He may even have time to learn about the semicolon, which would have been a nice trick to employ in the above situation.
